Name: Zombie Hunter
About the game: Zombie Hunter is a action game You have to move forward, defeating numerous zombies. explore the map and find items for survival. Zombies' attack is fatal. If you beat zombies while avoiding the attack with fast, You can survive. Rules of play: The operation of this game is very simple. Move : WASD Jump : Space Fire : Mouse1 / J Grenade : Mouse2 / K Interact : E Dodge : L Option : ESC Coin comes out every time you knock down zombies. Items come out every time we collect 10 coins. - Health - Ammunition. - Grenade If you collect a lot of items, you can effectively respond when you fight zombies. Attack item. - Knife. It's a short-range weapon, but it can immediately crush zombies. It's an essential weapon for your survival. - Hand gun As a long-range weapon, shoot at zombies from afar. Zombies will die before they come to you. - Rocket gun You can explode countless zombies with just one shot.
